definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The utility model adapts to the development of the programmed control telephone, and has the perfect function.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型適應程控電話的發展，具有較完善的功能。

sentences.english: Every year, the newly increased program-controlled telephone switches in China exceed 20 million lines that is number one in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國每年增加的程控電話兩千萬門以上，世界第一。
